dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A listener just sent in a message about Kazakhstan's new CryptoCity announcement.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A listener just sent in a message about Kazakhstan's new CryptoCity announcement.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, right, President Tokayev announced that at the Astana International Forum, didn't he?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, right, President Tokayev announced that at the Astana International Forum, didn't he?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Speaking at the opening of the plenary session of the Astana International Forum (AIF), President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev announced the creation of an innovative CryptoCity zone in Kazakhstan, according to Akorda.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, he said they're creating this special zone where you can use cryptocurrencies to buy goods and services.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, he said they're creating this special zone where you can use cryptocurrencies to buy goods and services.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We plan to establish a pioneering pilot zone called CryptoCity, where cryptocurrencies can be used to purchase goods, services, and for other purposes, the President stated.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That's uh, pretty ambitious. It sounds like they're really pushing for digital innovation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's uh, pretty ambitious. It sounds like they're really pushing for digital innovation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And it's not just that—he also mentioned the most powerful supercomputer being delivered to the country.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it's not just that-he also mentioned the most powerful supercomputer being delivered to the country.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kassym-Jomart Tokayev also reminded that Kazakhstan is launching the most powerful supercomputer, which has already been delivered to the country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, so they're investing heavily in tech infrastructure. I mean, what's the bigger goal here?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, so they're investing heavily in tech infrastructure. I mean, what's the bigger goal here?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: He talked about reducing regional disparities and strengthening the middle class, which is interesting.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He talked about reducing regional disparities and strengthening the middle class, which is interesting.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our top priority is to reduce regional disparities and strengthen the middle class.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and he emphasized digital transformation as part of becoming an IT hub for Eurasia.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and he emphasized digital transformation as part of becoming an I T hub for Eurasia.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the Head of State, Kazakhstan has made significant progress in digital transformation, reflecting the country's ambition to become an IT hub of Eurasia.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: They're also focusing on AI, too—wanting to be an academic and innovation center.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They're also focusing on A I, too-wanting to be an academic and innovation center.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We are placing special emphasis on artificial intelligence. Our goal is to become an academic and innovation hub, home to branches of foreign universities and research and development partnerships, said the President.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: With branches of foreign universities and R&D partnerships, it sounds like a long-term strategy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: With branches of foreign universities and R&D partnerships, it sounds like a long-term strategy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our goal is to become an academic and innovation hub, home to branches of foreign universities and research and development partnerships, said the President.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The forum itself is all about connecting minds and shaping the future, which fits perfectly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The forum itself is all about connecting minds and shaping the future, which fits perfectly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The theme of the forum is: Connecting Minds, Shaping the Future.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it's happening May 29th to 30th next year, bringing together governments, companies, academia...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and it's happening May twenty ninth to thirtieth next year, bringing together governments, companies, academia...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The event is taking place on May 29"30, 2025.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: To tackle global challenges like economy, security, ecology—it's a broad scope.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: To tackle global challenges like economy, security, ecology-it's a broad scope.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Astana International Forum is a platform for dialogue among representatives of governments, international organizations, major companies, and academia to address the most pressing global challenges"from the economy and security to ecology and climate.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely feels like a step toward positioning Kazakhstan on the global innovation map.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely feels like a step toward positioning Kazakhstan on the global innovation map.
